document.full_text: the cook county sheriff's office has become the first defendant in the shakman anti-patronage case to be found in compliance with court decrees; it should be a model for mayor-elect rahm emanuel.
document.title: chicago news cooperative : sheriff points the way to ending the mess with patronage hiring
lines_and_colors: the cook county sheriff's office has become the first defendant in the shakman anti-patronage case to be found in compliance with court decrees; it should be a model for mayor-elect rahm emanuel.
